name: B. Little Elephant and Elections
statement:
There have recently been elections in the zoo. Overall there were main
political parties: one of them is the Little Elephant Political Party,
other parties have less catchy names.Political parties find their number
in the ballot highly important. Overall there are possible numbers: .
Each of these parties is going to be assigned in some way to exactly one
number, at that, two distinct parties cannot receive the same number.The
Little Elephant Political Party members believe in the lucky digits and
. They want to evaluate their chances in the elections. For that, they
need to find out, how many correct assignments are there, such that the
number of lucky digits in the Little Elephant Political Party ballot
number is strictly larger than the total number of lucky digits in the
ballot numbers of 6 other parties. Help the Little Elephant Political
Party, calculate this number. As the answer can be rather large, print
the remainder from dividing it by .
